text: Has anybody had experience with stripe recurring payments and HubSpot?
Or if this is even possible?

Morning guys. Any Zapier pros out there? I'm looking to action a deal update, but I want to query the deal based on a custom property (Booking reference ID) instead of the object ID. However the object ID is required....Any ways I can get around this?
Hey William, it’s possible using DepositFix, what’s your use case?
